summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE REGARDING THE CLOCK SPRING. THE CONSUMER HAD THE REPAIRS ON THE CLOCK SPRING DONE ON 05/08/2002 PRIOR TO RECEIVING RECALL NOTICE. CONSUMER SENT RECEIPTS AS PROOF OF PAYMENT TO CHRYSLER ON JANUARY 12, 2003.  AND STILL DID NOT RECEIVE REIMBURSEMENT OF $208.61, NOR WAS CONSUMER NOTIFIED BY MANUFACTURER WHEN THE REIMBURSEMENT WOULD BRE ISSUED. *AK   *JB *TS
